column4: Hi, I have loaded iwl wifi module but cant run master mode with intel wireless
I thought this issue is solved for 10.04
tried configuring it in /etc/network/interfaces ?
nope, I did not found wiki page about it. This file now just contains: auto lo and iface lo
thats normal, you havent added any config
https://help.ubuntu.com/community/WifiDocs/MasterMode
yea Iv read this and this https://help.ubuntu.com/community/WifiDocs/Driver/iwlwifi_Intel_3945_4965/gutsy
it does not answer question
ipw driver is not included in 10.04 anymore
if you construct an interfaces file you can set it as a static IP and be in master mode
http://pastie.org/1077747     for example
I see, well Im going to try it
ah sorry.
what should  Ifilter to find version of flash in about config please ?
Shockwave Flash 10.2 r152
you mean probably from offcial repos from internet
so I tried older version same bad result
try the 1.1.7 version from the meunch ppa
what is it ?
a later version
sudo add-apt-repository ppa:n-muench/vlc; sudo apt-get update; sudo apt-get -y upgrade
